# Python: AI model consuming Go service results via Capâ€™n Proto RPC
from kodr.rpc import connect
from kodr.wasm import export
import numpy as np

@export
def predict_enhanced_waveform(samples: list[float]):
    dsp = connect('go://DSPService')
    enhanced = dsp.Process(samples)
    # Lightweight neural enhancement (inside WASM runtime)
    arr = np.array(enhanced)
    return arr / np.max(np.abs(arr))
